InstitutionalDepartmentName: Department of Biomedical and Clinical Sciences
Instructions: Concentrate on the sounds and count the number of deviants.
TaskDescription: Stimuli consisted of standard sounds and two types of deviant sounds - predictable (every 7th sound) and unpredictable (separated by 2-10 standard sounds). All sounds were separated by a randomly chosen ISI between 800 and 1200 ms.
